00014 #ifndef ULIB_ESCAPE_H
00015 #define ULIB_ESCAPE_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/base/coder/escape.h>
00018 
00019 #include <ulib/string.h>
00020 
00021 /* Encode-Decode escape sequences into a buffer, the following are recognized:
00022  * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00023  * \0  NUL
00024  * \b  BS  backspace          (\010  8  8)
00025  * \t  HT  horizontal tab     (\011  9  9)
00026  * \n  LF  newline            (\012 10  A)
00027  * \v  VT  vertical tab       (\013 11  B)
00028  * \f  FF  formfeed           (\014 12  C)
00029  * \r  CR  carriage return    (\015 13  D)
00030  * \e  ESC character          (\033 27 1B)
00031  *
00032  * \^C   C = any letter (Control code)
00033  * \xDD  number formed of 1-2 hex   digits
00034  * \DDD  number formed of 1-3 octal digits
00035  * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036  */
00037 
00038 struct U_EXPORT UEscape {
00039 
00040         static void encode(const unsigned char* s, uint32_t n, UString& buffer)
00041                 {
00042                 U_TRACE(0, "UEscape::encode(%.*S,%u,%.*S)", n, s, n, U_STRING_TO_TRACE(buffer))
00043 
00044 #  ifdef DEBUG
00045                 uint32_t length = ((n * 3) + 4);
00046 
00047                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("buffer.capacity() = %u length = %u", buffer.capacity(), length)
00048 
00049                 U_ASSERT(buffer.capacity() >= length + 1)
00050 #  endif
00051 
00052                 uint32_t pos = u_escape_encode(s, n, buffer.data(), buffer.capacity());
00053 
00054                 buffer.size_adjust(pos);
00055                 }
00056 
00057         static void encode(const UString& s, UString& buffer)
00058                 { encode((const unsigned char*)U_STRING_TO_PARAM(s), buffer); }
00059 
00060         static bool decode(const char* s, uint32_t n, UString& buffer)
00061                 {
00062                 U_TRACE(0, "UEscape::decode(%.*S,%u,%.*S)", n, s, n, U_STRING_TO_TRACE(buffer))
00063 
00064                 uint32_t pos = u_escape_decode(s, n, (unsigned char*)buffer.data());
00065 
00066                 buffer.size_adjust(pos);
00067 
00068                 bool result = (pos > 0);
00069 
00070                 U_RETURN(result);
00071                 }
00072 
00073         static bool decode(const UString& s, UString& buffer)
00074                 { return decode(U_STRING_TO_PARAM(s), buffer); }
00075 };
00076 
00077 #endif
